title: Barry Bonds
summary: Barry Lamar Bonds (born July 24, 1964) is an American former professional baseball left fielder who played 22 seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB). Bonds was a member of the Pittsburgh Pirates from 1986 to 1992 and the San Francisco Giants from 1993 to 2007.[1] He is considered to be one of the greatest baseball players of all time.[2][3][4][5][6]
